title: Jhin sound bug (Karma)
body: When Jhin and Karma join same team, Jhins [Q] have additional sound on explosion. The sound is the same as exploding Karmas [Q]. This happened to us on normal game(blind pick on summoners rift) and then we tried it on custom game on summoners rift. Bug happens every time

replies.body:
Hey Wujek Jar  -

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on here!
